ca.ubc.magic.icd.android
Class QRItem

java.lang.Object
  ca.ubc.magic.icd.android.QRItem

public class QRItem
extends java.lang.Object

Parses and stores information from various popular QR-Code formats into a backing Hashmap. Wraps the map and exposes the get() and put() interfaces. Restricts keys and values to string values. Various convenience methods are included for common QR-Code related tasks.

Author:
skidson

Constructor Detail

QRItem

public QRItem(java.lang.String code)
Method Detail

parse

private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parse(java.lang.String code)
Parses all recognized tags into a backing hashmap. Fields should be seperated with semicolons and with key-value pairs seperated by colons. An example input would be: Name:Bob;Phone:555-5555. If the code is a URL, it is associated with a single key "url".

Parameters:
code - the unparsed string read from a QR-Code
Returns:
a map of keys to their associated values.

parseMagic

getImageDrawable

public Drawable getImageDrawable(java.lang.String chl,
                                 java.lang.String chs,
                                 java.lang.String choe,
                                 java.lang.String chld)
                          throws java.net.MalformedURLException,
                                 java.io.IOException
Generates and returns a Drawable of this QR code via Google Charts API

Parameters:
context - the context the ImageView is for
chl - data to encode
chs - chart size (x)
choe - encoding data (UTF-8, Shift_JIS, ISO-8859-1)
chld - error correction level (L, M, Q, H) for (7%, 15%, 25%, 30% recovery)
Returns:
A Drawable image of this item's QR Code.
Throws:
java.io.IOException
java.net.MalformedURLException
